post.description:
Accepts configuration-style payload with descriptions and severity rules.
The server persists the gap for the provided `dimension_id`.

Required fields:
- `dimension_id` (UUID)
- `gap_size` (integer)

Optional fields:
- `gap_description` (string)
- `descriptions` with rules to determine severity and default description

Minimal example:
{
"dimension_id": "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6",
"gap_size": 2,
"descriptions": [
{
"description": "Default description",
"rules": [ { "min_abs_gap": 0, "max_abs_gap": 3, "gap_severity": "MEDIUM" } ]
}
]
}

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of gaps for a specific assessment across all dimensions.

get.summary: Get assessment summary with related data

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of gaps for a specific dimension assessment.

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 10, max: 100)

get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific gap using its unique identifier.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all recommendations in the system.

put.description: Updates the priority and/or description of an existing recommendation.

delete.description: Deletes a recommendation by its ID.
